cast.name: 格拉谢拉·博尔赫斯 Graciela Borges
马克斯·贝利纳 Max Berliner

writer.name: Raúl de la Torre Raúl de la Torre
曼努埃尔·普伊格 Manuel Puig

director.name: Raúl de la Torre Raúl de la Torre

introduction: It's about three women, three stories, or perhaps a single story in different projections of time and space. The Mistress wishes to unravel the meaning of being a woman is the victim of Hollywood. Ana is the product of a society ruled or dominated by men.The film is about three women, three stories, or perhaps just one story in different projections of time and space. The Mistress wants to unravel the meaning of being a woman and is the victim of Hollywood. Ana is the product of a society ruled or dominated by men. W218 belongs to the last five years of the atomic age. The three women are the three faces of Argentina: yesterday, today and tomorrow.Puig's novel had been a commercial success and the funds to make a film about it were easily obtained, but something was happening because its release was delayed. Undoubtedly, the title of Puig - who had previously published The Kiss of the Spider Woman and Painted Mouths - had to provoke more and more susceptibilities in the spheres of the military government that had just failed in the Falklands War. When some journalists tried to find out in the Qualification Entity, they did not find an answer. Then they asked Miguel Paulino Tato, the previous retired head of the Entity, about his opinion, who gave the reason why he had not authorized the exhibition: «Because such a title should never be missed. A film with that title must be outrageous and the Argentine State cannot spend money on such garbage. ”
